name: JuDDGES_Polish_Court_Judgments_Raw_Dataset
description: A comprehensive collection of Polish court judgments in raw format, containing XML content and extracted metadata.

field.name: judgment_id
field.description: The judgment id of the court judgment

field.name: docket_number
field.description: The docket number of the court judgment

field.name: judgment_date
field.description: The judgment date of the court judgment

field.name: last_update
field.description: The last update of the court judgment

field.name: court_id
field.description: The court id of the court judgment

field.name: department_id
field.description: The department id of the court judgment

field.description: The judgment type of the court judgment

field.name: judges
